title: Hero Electric drags Hero Moto to court over use of brand name in EV space
description: Vijay Munjal and son Naveen Munjal, owners of Hero Electric, have taken cousin Pawan Munjal, CMD of two-wheeler market leader Hero MotoCorp, to court for the use of the Hero brand name for Hero MotoCorp's soon-to-debut EV range.
